price: except the messenger whom He chooses, then He appoints angel-guards before him and behind him[12]
arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
footnotes: [12] Protecting him so that others do not know what he was informed of the unseen.
